SHE STRIKES FLOOR WITH HER STICK THREE TILES.
RUMBLE OF THUNDER ON THIRD TAP, AND PETER ASSUMES
BOXING POSE. AS THUNDER ENDS, HE REGAINS USE OF
LIMBS. /
PETER: What, squaring up like this?
(SQUARING) Come on!
WITCH: Yes, just like that.
PETER: What, at eveiybody I come across?
(SQUARING) Come oni
WITCH: At everybody you come across.
PETER:
Big
and little? Come on,
WITCH:
Big
and little
PETER:
But
they won't like iti

Not
a bit.

Come oni
